alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 6:30AM CDT until June 15 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Northern Scott County in central Mississippi... East central Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 630 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmhaven, or 15 miles west of Carthage, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ludlow around 650 AM CDT. Lena around 705 AM CDT. Tuscola around 710 AM CDT. Standing Pine around 715 AM CDT. Walnut Grove and Harperville around 720 AM CDT. Steele around 730 AM CDT. Sebastopol around 735 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
